misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The code is using AES encryption algorithm, which is not broken or risky. However, it is highly recommended to use AES-GCM for its better security guarantees in terms of confidentiality and integrity.
recommendation: Use AES-GCM instead of AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding for better security.
